front.title: RBridges: OAM and BFD Support for TRILL

abstract.t: This document specifies a general channel for sending OAM (Operations, Administration, and Maintenance) messages between RBridges in a campus through an extension to the TRILL (Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links) protocol. It further specifies use of this channel for the BFD (Bidirectional Forwarding Detection) protocol.
